TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BindingCompleteContext extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction of the binding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext ControlUpdate = int32(0)

Docs.summary: An indication that the control property value is being updated from the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext DataSourceUpdate = int32(1)

Docs.summary: An indication that the data source value is being updated from the control property.
